summary: This is a forwarded email from January 18, 2020, in which an individual offers information about Jeffrey Epstein, claiming he was mentioned as her financial advisor by her first husband prior to 1991. She also mentions knowing a woman named Starr Maxwell, whose husband is a pilot named 'Max' with a British accent, and requests contact to explain more.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email inquiry; the writer claims he was mentioned as her financial advisor by her first husband prior to 1991.

persons.name: Starr Maxwell
persons.context: A woman the email writer has known since age 10, who is married to a pilot named 'Max'.

persons.name: Max
persons.context: The husband of Starr Maxwell, described as a pilot who goes by 'Max' and has a British accent.

connections.description: The email writer connects them by mentioning both in the same context of offering information about Epstein, though no direct relationship between Epstein and Maxwell is stated.
Described as married; Max is Starr Maxwell's husband.

events.title: Mention of Epstein as financial advisor
events.description: Prior to 1991, the email writer's first husband mentioned Jeffrey Epstein as her financial advisor.

events.title: Information offer regarding Epstein case
events.description: An individual sends an email offering to share information and memories about Jeffrey Epstein, including connections to Starr Maxwell and her pilot husband.

keyFacts: The writer claims Jeffrey Epstein was mentioned as her financial advisor by her first husband prior to 1991.
The writer has known a woman named Starr Maxwell since she was 10 years old.
Starr Maxwell is married to a pilot who goes by 'Max' and has a British accent.
The document is a forwarded email from January 18, 2020, offering information about the Epstein case.
The writer requests contact to explain more details about her memories and connections.
